page.title: 05Dundrennan Community Council
page.content: The Dundrennan Community Council was formed nine years ago.It consists of six members who are elected every 3 years at a local election.The Council meet every 3 months in Dundrennan Village Hall. During the 1980's the Community Council have built roadside summer seats,and put up a slide,monkeybars and tyres for the children's play area. This year the council is organising a Community Fete,which will be held in August.Funds raised,will go towards the Senior Citizens Outing and extending the childrens playground. Other work involves dealing with and solving complaints from local people.
